benchmark_details.name: GUIDE BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: GUIDE BENCH is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate guideline following performance of LLMs in real-world applications.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capability of LLMs to follow domain-oriented guidelines in real-world applications.

data.source: Generated through a combination of automatic synthesis and human-in-the-loop refinement.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the number of correctly predicted labels comparing outputs to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: A higher accuracy indicates better alignment of LLM responses with guideline requirements.
methodology.baseline_results: Results from 18 prominent LLMs, with Deepseek-R1 being one of the best-performing models.
methodology.validation: Validated through human annotation and expert review.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Measures are taken to address privacy risks, ensuring rigorous de-identification and anonymization.
